Rinjani

A Land of Adventure, Serenity, and Stunning Views

Discover the Beauty of
Mount Rinjani

Mount Rinjani, located on Lombok Island, Indonesia, is one of the world's most stunning volcanoes. With an elevation of 3,726 meters, Rinjani offers breathtaking views, challenging treks, and an immersive natural experience.


Mount Rinjani is also rich in cultural significance, serving as a sacred site for local communities. Its diverse landscape, from lush forests to volcanic craters, showcases the beauty of Indonesia's natural heritage.

Explore the Adventure

What You Can Do at Mount Rinjani

Summit Hiking

Challenge yourself with a hike to the summit of Mount Rinjani for stunning views and an unforgettable sunrise experience.

Segara Anak Lake

Visit the serene Segara Anak Lake, a beautiful crater lake surrounded by lush landscapes, perfect for a peaceful retreat.

Natural Hot Springs

Relax in the healing waters of the natural hot springs near Segara Anak Lake, perfect after a long hike.
